original_text: When they stumble, they shall receive a little help. And many shall join themselves to them with flattery,
korean_text: 그들이 몰락할 때에 도움을 조금 얻을 것이나 많은 사람들이 속임수로 그들과 결합할 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall receive a little help.
And many shall join themselves to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람들이 그들에게 합세할 것이며
